codecov.desc: Configure general codecov settings. More info: https://docs.codecov.com/docs/codecov-yaml

codecov.ci.desc: Additional CI provider URLs you want Codecov to recognize. More info: https://docs.codecov.com/docs/detecting-ci-services
The username you want to use for Codecov operations. More info: https://docs.codecov.com/docs/team-bot
The repository upload token. More info: https://docs.codecov.com/docs/codecov-uploader#upload-token
Specify a branch you want Codecov to always only read the YAML from. More info: https://docs.codecov.io/docs/codecov-yaml#section-restricting-changes
